snippet: Experts found it baffling and uncharacteristic that Iran’s Quds Force would risk linking itself so publicly to plotting a terrorist attack on American soil.
lead_paragraph: Experts found it baffling and uncharacteristic that Iran’s Quds Force would risk linking itself so publicly to plotting a terrorist attack on American soil.

headline.main: Odd Twist for Elite Unit Guiding Iran’s Proxy Wars
headline.print_headline: Odd Twist for Elite Unit Guiding Iran’s Proxy Wars
headline.seo: New Plot Is Odd Twist for Iran’s Elite Quds Force
